item.description:
Our hosts will be David and Kristin of Westminster School. They write the following description:

"We want all of you to have the opportunity to bring an item and show/tell! Talk a couple of minutes about you and whatever you'd like to share with all your friends! It could be about food, your teddy bear, your favorite sport, pictures of your country, books, websites, hobbies, etc. We have a computer projector for pictures and/or home made movies, etc. It's a back-to-school night kind of thing."

Please bring food (including desserts) to share. BYOB.

The meeting will be in the hinman Reading Room (Cushing Hall), Westminster School, Simsbury, CT. For directions, go to http://westminster-sc...

For info or if you get lost, call
David 203 518-2246
Kristin 203 518 2247

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Hartford Spanish August Show and Tell Fiesta
